LightningComponentBundle.description: Watches passed-in Batch IDs for completion and graphically reports on outcomes

property.name: batchIds
property.label: Batch IDs
property.description: List of Batch IDs to watch for completion

property.name: queryFrequencyInSeconds
property.label: Retry Frequency
property.description: How often (in seconds) to check for Batch completion (Default: 6)

property.name: queriesSentMax
property.label: Max Retries
property.description: Maximum number of times to query database before timeout (Default: 30)

property.name: errorMessage
property.label: Error Message
property.description: Message to display on error encountered in one or more batches

property.name: successMessage
property.label: Success Message
property.description: Message to display on total batch process success

property.name: timeoutMessage
property.label: Timeout Message
property.description: Message to display once timeout window has been reached
